titulo: Mini Gokû wa obotchama! Boku Gohan desu.
descripcion: Start of the "Saiya-jin Saga". It has been five years since the defeat of Piccolo Daimao, and Goku and Chichi have settled down at Goku's old home in Mt. Paozu. They now have a son named Gohan, named after Goku's grandfather. One day Goku is supposed to meet his old friends for a reunion at Kame House house, but before he leaves he must find Gohan, who is lost in the forest. Meanwhile, a mysterious Saiya-jin warrior lands on Earth and searches for someone named Kakarotto. Instead, he finds Piccolo, who is still training to defeat Goku.

titulo: Shijô saikyô no senshi wa Gokû no ani datta!
descripcion: Friends arrives at Kame Sen'nin house for a reunion, but an alien warrior crashes the party. He reveals himself to be Raditz, Son Goku's older brother, and he explains the history of the Saiyan-jin. He also reveals that Kakarotto is the birth name of Goku, a Saija-jin himself, who was sent to Earth as an infant to extinguish human life.

titulo: Yatta! Kore ga chijô saikyô no konbi da!
descripcion: Hoping to force Son Goku into following his orders, Raditz abducts Gohan. While Goku and the others decide what to do next, Piccolo shows up. Realizing that Raditz is too powerful for either fighter to defeat alone, Son Goku and Piccolo forge an alliance and confront him.

titulo: Pikkoro no kirifuda! Gohan wa nakimushi-kun
descripcion: Son Goku and Piccolo fight Raditz. While Son Goku fends Raditz off, Piccolo attempts to gather enough energy to use his newest attack.

titulo: Gokû shisu! Rasuto chansu wa ichido dake
descripcion: In a rage, Gohan breaks free from his prison and attacks Raditz. Goku distracts Raditz in an attempt to save Gohan, and Piccolo charges his Makankôsappô for one final attack. Meanwhile, two other Saiya-jin hear Piccolo speak of the Dragon Balls through Raditz's scouter and decide to come to Earth.

titulo: Enma-sama mo bikkuri Ano yo de faito
descripcion: Son Goku's friends form a plan to bring him back to life with the Dragon Balls, and Piccolo takes Gohan away to train him in preparation for the arrival of the two Saiya-jin. Meanwhile, Kami-Sama meets Goku in the Other World and sends him down the Snake Way in search of Kaiô-Sama, a legendary martial arts master with the ability to make Goku strong enough to help his friends battle the Saiya-jin.

titulo: Kyôryû to sabaibaru! Gohan no tsurai shugyô
descripcion: Piccolo leaves Gohan to fend for himself in the wilderness for six months so that he can become stronger and learn to take care of himself. Meanwhile, Krillin tries to break the news of Gohan's training and Goku's death to Chichi. Also, Kami-Sama foresees his own demise and wonders about Piccolo's motives, and Goku continues his journey down Hebi no Michi.

titulo: Tsuki no kagayaku yoru ni dai henshin! Gohan pawâ no himitsu
descripcion: Kuririn returns to Kame House without telling Chichi of Goku's death and Gohan's training with Piccolo, and Chichi and Gyûmaô set out to find what he's hiding. Yajirobê brings a message to Kuririn, telling him to find Yamcha, Tenshinhan, and Chaozu and to meet back at Karin's for special training in preparation for the Saiya-jin, because Kami-Sama himself will train them. Meanwhile, as Gohan tries to find the courage to get down from the cliff he glances at the full moon, which turns him into an Ôzaru, and Piccolo must find a way to stop him. Also, Goku continues down...

titulo: Gomen ne robotto-san Sabaku ni kieta namida.
descripcion: Gohan is attacked by wild animals. As he attempts to escape, he falls into an underground cavern, where he finds a robot who teaches him to take care of himself. Meanwhile, Goku, who is still on Hebi no Michi, takes a break from running to eat clouds.

titulo: Naku na Gohan! Hajimete no tatakai
descripcion: Kuririn picks up Yamucha, who is playing in a baseball game. Meanwhile, Gohan gathers food and mends his wounds, and he helps a dinosaur who has been injured. Also, Gokû wakes up from a nap and continues down Hebi no Michi.

titulo: Uchû ichi no kyô senshi Saiya-jin mezameru!
descripcion: While on their way to Earth, Vegeta and Nappa take a quick detour in an attempt to conquer the planet Arlia. Meanwhile, Gohan dines on the tail of a dinosaur, Lunch runs from the police, and Gokû continues down Hebi no Michi.

titulo: Hebi no michi de inemuri Gokû ga okkochiru
descripcion: Kuririn and Buruma search for Tenshinhan and Chaozu, who are training under a waterfall, and Ranchi tries to convince Tenshinhan to rob banks with her. Meanwhile, Son Gokû gets a ride in Hebi no Michi from an Untenshu and Gohan continues his training. Also, Pikkoro trains by lifting the Pyramids with his mind, but he accidentally causes and earthquake which affects everyone.

titulo: Te o dasu na! Enma-sama no himitsu no kudamono.
descripcion: Having fallen off from Hebi no Michi, Goku finds himself in block 1 of Hell. There he meets Gozu and Mezu, two "oni" who will help him find his way back to Hebi no Michi if he can defeat them in a series of challenges. Meanwhile, Ten Shin Han and Chaozu climb Karin's Tower; Lunch meets Upa and Bora while trying to find a way to follow TenShinHan up the tower; and Gohan runs from a tiger.

titulo: Ama~i yûwaku! Hebi-hime-sama no omotenashi
descripcion: Having caught up to where he was when he fell, Goku continues down Hebi no Michi. He stops at a palace, thinking it to be where Kaio-Sama lives, but it turns out to belong to Hebi Hime, who likes him so much that she won't let him leave. Meanwhile, Gohan watches Piccolo train; Kuririn, Yamucha, TenShinHan, Chaozu, and Yajirobe begin their training with Kami-Sama.

titulo: Pikkoro kara no dasshutsu! Arashi o yobu Gohan
descripcion: Gohan does his homework in a cave as he thinks about how much he misses his parents. He then makes a boat and sails across the desert, where he is chased by a giant bird. He crash lands on an island, and he befriends a tiger as he looks for a way to escape. Meanwhile, Piccolo splits himself in two and fights his doppelganger as part of his training. Also, Goku continues down Hebi no Michi.

titulo: Hashire Gohan! Chichi no matsu natsukashi no Paozu-yama
descripcion: Having crashed his ship because of the storm, Gohan is found on the beach by a group of orphans who he stays with for awhile.

titulo: Asu naki machi! Shôri e no tôi michinori
descripcion: Piccolo begins heavy training with Gohan. At Kami-Sama's lookout, Kuririn, Yamucha, TenShinHan, and Chaozu grow impatient because they feel that they aren't learning anything from Kami-Sama's training, so Mr. Popo uses the time chamber to transport them back in time to planet Vegeta, where they fight two Saiya-jin.

titulo: Shûte~n hebi no michi! Omê Kaiô-sama ka?
descripcion: Piccolo is forced to fight Gohan, who turns into Ôzaru when he sees the moon that is projected from Goku's Saiya-jin spacecraft. Meanwhile, Son Goku reaches the end of Hebi no Michi and meets Kaiô-Sama.

titulo: Jûryoku to no tatakai! Baburusu-kun o tsukamaero
descripcion: Before he can start his training, Goku must make Kaiô-Sama laugh. Then, his training begins--he must catch Kaiô's monkey, Bubbles. Meanwhile, Piccolo and Gohan continue to train.

titulo: Yomigaeru Saiya-jin densetsu! Gokû no rûtsu
descripcion: In the next phase of Goku's training, he must hit Gregory, Kaiô's grasshopper, with a sledge hammer; also, Kaiô-Sama tells Goku about the history of the Saiya-jin. Back on Earth, Piccolo continues training Gohan, and Kuririn, Tenshinhan, Chaozu, Yamucha, and Yajirobe train at Kami-Sama's lookout.

titulo: Ide yo Shenron! Saiya-jin tsui ni chikyû tôchaku
descripcion: Kaiô times Goku on catching Bubbles and Gregory, and Goku practices the Genki Dama technique. Goku then contacts Master Roshi and tells him to wish him back to life, and he begins his journey back down Hebi no mishi. Meanwhile, as the Z Senshi finish their training, the Saiyajin land on Earth.

titulo: N'na baka na! Tsuchi kara umareta Saibaiman
descripcion: Nappa destroys East City, and he and Vegeta head toward Piccolo and Gohan; the other Z Senshi also fly to where the battle is going to take place, with Kuririn arriving first; Yajirobe tells a group of people about the Saiyajin.

titulo: Yamucha shisu! Osoru beshi Saibaiman
descripcion: The Z Senchi and the Saiyajin agree to fight a series of one on one matches, and Tenshinhan and Yamucha fight the first two Saibaiman while their friends watch helplessly on TV; Son Goku races back home as fast as he can; Yajirobe talks to a group of reporters about the battle.

titulo: Sayonara Ten-san! Chaozu no sutemi no senpô
descripcion: Kuririn and Piccolo finish off the Saibaiman, and the surviving Z Senshi fight Nappa. Meanwhile, Goku passes Hebi no Hime's palace as he races Earth.

titulo: Tenshinhan zekkyô!! Kore ga saigo no Kikôhô da
descripcion: The battle with Nappa continues as Pikkoro and Kuririn try to ambush him while he fights Tenshinhan. Also, Kami-Sama senses that the end of his life is approaching, and Son Goku continues on Hebi no michi.

titulo: Hitasura matte 3 jikan! Dangan hikô no Kinto'un
descripcion: As everyone stops fighting to wait for Goku to arrive, Nappa goes on a rampage and engages civilians and military personnel. Also, Goku returns to Earth and rushes to the battlefield.

titulo: Boku ni makasete! Gohan · ikari no dai bakuhatsu
descripcion: Piccolo, Kuririn, and Son Gohan fend off Nappa as Son Goku makes his final approach on Kinton cloud. Meanwhile, Bulma thinks about happier times and Gyumao tries to stop Chichi from joining the battle.

titulo: Saiya-jin no môi! Kami-sama mo Pikkoro mo shinda
descripcion: As Kami-Sama fades from existence while Piccolo dies, he tells Mr. Popo to go to Namekku-sei to retrieve their Dragon Balls; Gohan, in a rage, fights Nappa; Uranai Baba arrives at Kame House to announce Son Goku's return; Goku arrives on the battlefield and fights Nappa.

titulo: Tôsan sugê ya! Kyûkyoku no hissatsuwaza · Kaiô-ken
descripcion: Goku fights Nappa.

titulo: Genkai o koeta atsui tatakai! Gokû tai Bejîta
descripcion: Son Goku fights Vegeta, and he uses the Kaiô-Ken technique; Kuririn and Son Gohan fly back to Kame House; Lunch drinks her troubles away in a bar; Vegeta causes a massive earthquake and storm while powering up.

titulo: Ima da Gokû! Subete o kaketa saigo no ôwaza
descripcion: Son Goku and Vegeta continue to fight, and Goku uses a triple Kaiô-Ken. Frustrated that he can't beat Goku, Vegeta attempts to destroy Earth using his Galick Gun attack, and Goku gives everything he has in a desperate attempt to stop it.

titulo: Sentô-ryoku 10-bai!! Bejîta dai henshin
descripcion: Vegeta uses his energy to create artificial moonlight and turns into Ôzaru, and Son Goku, after trying to fight him, realizes that his only chance for victory is to use the Genki Dama. Meanwhile, Son Gohan flies back to help his dad.

titulo: Shinanaide tôsan!! Kore ga Gohan no sokojikara
descripcion: Kuririn, Son Gohan, and Yajirobê arrive to help Son Gokû, who is being crushed by Ôzaru Vegeta.

titulo: Ute Kuririn! Negai o kometa Genki-dama
descripcion: Son Gohan fights Vegeta as Kuririnn prepares to throw the Genki Dama that he created from the last of Son Goku's energy. Also, Karin shows up at the Kame House, and he, Roshi, Bulma, and Chichi go to help.

titulo: Kiseki o okose! Sûpâ Saiya-jin Son Gohan
descripcion: Yajirobe distracts Vegeta as Son Gohan turns into a Ôzaru by looking at the artificial moonlight created by Vegeta, and Ôzaru Gohan and Vegeta fight.

titulo: Tobidase uchû e! Kibô no hoshi wa Pikkoro no furusato
descripcion: The battle with Vegeta is over--the survivors are picked up by Roshi, Bulma, Chichi and Karin, and everybody mourns their fallen friends. Also, Kuririn devises a plan to go to Namekku-sei to find their dragon balls and revive their friends.

titulo: Nazo no yunzabitto! Kami-Sama no uchûsen o sagase
descripcion: Son Goku, Son Gohan, and Kuririn recover in the hospital. Also, after accidentally destroying the Saiyajin spaceship, Bulma goes with Mr. Popo to find another ship that Kami-Sama told him about.

titulo: Namekku-sei iki hasshin! Gohan-tachi o matsu kyôfu
descripcion: Bulma and her dad work on Kami-Sama's spaceship; Son Gohan sneaks out of his room to train and Chichi looks for him; Son Goku, Son Gohan, and Kuririn continue to recover in the hospital; Bulma recruits Son Gohan and Kuririn to go with her to Namekku-sei.

titulo: Teki ka mikata ka? Nazo no kyodai uchûsen no kodomo-tachi
descripcion: Son Gohan, Kuririn, and Buruma try to occupy themselves on their ship until they are attacked by a squadron of smaller ships. They escape, but they are captured by a command ship that is camouflaged to look like the rest of space, and they leave their own ship to investigate the inside of the command ship. Also, Son Goku is scolded by his doctor for training in the hospital, and Vegeta travels through space planning his revenge on Son Goku.

titulo: Honto ni honto? Are ga kibô no Namekku-sei
descripcion: While Kuririn, Son Gohan, and Bulma are held at gunpoint, the ship enters an asteroid belt. After they help their captors through the asteroids, the kids tell them about how the villainous Freeza killed their parents and friends and took over their planet. Meanwhile, Son Goku is scared to death of getting a shot at the hospital, and Vegeta arrives back at Freeza's base.

titulo: Shinsetsu na uchû-jin ikinari atta Ûshinchuu
descripcion: Bulma crashes the spaceship on what she believes to be Namekku-sei, and she, Kuririn, and Son Gohan are nursed to health by two mysterious aliens. Afterward, while one of the aliens stays behind to fix the ship, the others begin searching for the Dragon Balls. Meanwhile, Vegeta continues his recovery, and Son Goku gets antsy in the hospital.

titulo: Wasusei Furîza No. 79 Fukkatsu no Bejîta!!
descripcion: Son Gohan, Kuririn, and Buruma continue looking for the Dragon Balls. They have to retrieve one from inside a tornado, and they go to a castle where a giant lives to find the next one. Meanwhile, Son Goku sneaks out of the hospital to train, and Vegeta finishes his recovery.

titulo: Sorotta zo Doragon Bôru! Pikkoro-san mo ikikaeru
descripcion: Kuririn, Son Gohan, and Buruma find the 6th Dragon Ball in an ice cave, and they must escape before the cave collapses. They also search for the final Dragon Ball. Meanwhile, Vegeta stews over his defeat, and he looks for Freeza. Also, Son Goku continues training, despite his injuries not being fully healed, while Master Roshi and Chichi look for him.

titulo: Arata na kyôteki! Uchû no teiyô Furîza
descripcion: Zâkuro and Raichi explain their illusion to Kuririn, Son Gohan and Buruma. As Kuririn and Son Gohan try to escape from the lake monsters holding them captive, the two aliens try to figure out the spaceship. Also Kuririn, Son Gohan and Buruma attempt to escape the planet and continue their journey to Namekku-sei. Meanwhile, Vegeta continues to fly to Namekku-sei, and Son Goku tries to sneak out of the hospital again.

titulo: Yabô no Bejîta! Uchû ichi no senshi wa ore da!!
descripcion: Freeza and his henchmen, Zarbon and Dodoria, gather some Dragon Balls. Kyui (Cui) tracks down Vegeta and is surprised by his strength. Two of Freeza's scouts attack Son Gohan and Kuririn while Son Goku does mental training in the hospital.

titulo: Gokû pawâ zenkai!! Ginga no hate made 6-kakan
descripcion: Son Gohan, Kuririn, and Buruma hide in a cave when they sense the energy of Freeza and his cronies, who are looking for the 5th Dragon Ball. Son Gohan and Kuririn follow them while Buruma calls Kame Sen'nin and informs him of the trouble, he in turn tells Son Goku. Yajirobe brings Son Goku some senzu beans, and Goku, now healed, leaves the hospital and picks up a spaceship that Dr. Brief built for him to use to get to Namekku-sei.

titulo: Ihyô o tsuita kôgeki!! Chôrô no nerai wa sukautâ
descripcion: As Son Goku trains on his ship, Son Gohan and Kuririn watch as Freeza and his henchmen Zarbon and Dodoria, interrogate a group of Namekkuseijin about the Dragon Ball, and another group of Namekku Senshi show up to stand against them.

titulo: Gohan ayaushi! Shi o yobu tsuisekisha Dodoria
descripcion: After Dodoria easily defeats the three Namekku senshi, Freeza sends Chôrô to get the Dragon Ball. But when Dodoria begins to execute the remaining Namekkusei-jin, Son Gohan has seen enough, and he intervenes. Meanwhile, Son Goku continues to train on his ship.

titulo: Bakushi Dodoria! Bejîta no osoru beki shôgekiha
descripcion: Son Gohan, Kuririn, and Dende escape from Dodoria; Burîfu Hakase tells his daughter Buruma that Son Gokû is on his way; Vegeta confronts Dodoria and learns the truth behind the destruction of his home planet.

titulo: Moeru wakusei kara no dasshutsu!! Inochigake no Kamehameha
descripcion: After evading Vegeta, Krillin, Gohan, and Dende return to the cave and meet with Bulma. While Goku is outside his ship fixing damage to the hull, Dr. Brief informs him that the asteroid that did the damage also knocked the ship off course, and that he is now headed directly for a star. Vegeta goes to the next village to find a dragon ball.

titulo: Yûki hyakubai! Kaiô no moto ni shûketsu suru senshi-tachi
descripcion: Vegeta fights a group of Nameks for the dragon ball that they are holding. Frieza sends Zarbon and another soldier to find the remaining dragon balls. After hearing about how Vegeta terrorized Earth, Dende decides to take Krillin to see the eldest Namek so that they can form an alliance and defeat their foes. Goku continues his training in 20 times normal gravity and Yamcha, Tien, Chiaotzu, and Piccolo arrive at King Kai's planet to train.

titulo: Kike Gokû yo! Furîza ni wa te o dasu na
descripcion: Goku tells King Kai and Yamcha about what has been happening on Namek, but when King Kai learns that Frieza is there, he warns Goku to stay away. Piccolo, Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu must make King Kai laugh before he will train them. Krillin and Dende hide from Vegeta, who has sensed them; Vegeta fights Zarbon.

titulo: Hotondo torihada! Bisenshi Zâbon no akuma no henshin
descripcion: Zarbon reveals his ferocious transformation to Vegeta; Kuririn and Dende continue their journey to the eldest Namekkuseijin; Son Goku trains under 50 times normal gravity; Tenshinhan, Yamucha, and Chaozu train as Piccolo meditates.

titulo: Kibô no hoshi o mamore!! Kuririn kyôi no pâwa UP
descripcion: Guru reads Krillin's mind and sees his good intentions, so he decides to help Krillin in his quest. Zarbon reports to Frieza, who grows angry with Zarbon's carelessness regarding his fight with Vegeta. Gohan goes after the dragon ball that Vegeta hid and Goku can't move after his latest training session.

titulo: Shi no fuchi kara yomigaetta kiseki no otoko - Bejîta
descripcion: Goku continues to train on his ship, doing sit-ups. Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu chase Bubbles and Gregory as part of their training while Piccolo grows frustrated with what he considers a waste of time. One of Frieza's cronies tries to revive Vegeta; Piccolo spars with Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu.

titulo: Dodekai sentô-ryoku!! Kudakechiru Furîza no inbô
descripcion: Vegeta steals the dragon balls from Frieza's ship, and Zarbon chases after him. Gohan finds one of the destroyed villages, where he buries the dead and finds the dragon ball that Vegeta hid. Vegeta follows Krillin, who has the last dragon ball and the gravity in Goku's spaceship increases to dangerous levels as he passes through a magnetic storm.

titulo: Genki ga modotta zo!! 100-bai chô jûryoku no naka no Gokû
descripcion: Son Goku, still in the magnetic storm, attempts to save himself before he is crushed by the gravity; Vegeta and Zarbon fight a rematch as Kuririn and Buruma watch in fear; Son Gohan flies back with the Dragon Ball he located.

titulo: Furîza no himitsu heiki! Akuma no Ginyû tokusentai
descripcion: Krillin reassures Bulma that Gohan has one of the dragon balls; the Ginyu Force is launched; as Yamcha, Piccolo, Tien, and Chiaotzu are training, King Kai senses the Ginyu Force; Goku keeps training at 100 times normal gravity; Gohan has a run-in with Vegeta.

titulo: Buruma ga abunai!! Sûshinchû wa Furîza no te ni
descripcion: Bulma dreams that Vegeta kills her; Vegeta ponders how to get the last dragon ball; Frieza loses his temper and fires random energy blasts; Krillin and Gohan fly toward Guru; Bulma tries to retrieve the dragon ball, which she loses in a lake; Goku fires kamehameha waves at himself to build his resistance.

titulo: Gekitotsu da!! Fukutsu no tôshi no Kaiô-Ken to Kamehameha
descripcion: Bulma convinces the two soldiers who captured her to go after the dragon balls for themselves, and they go to the bottom of a lake to find one; Goku trains with kaio-ken in 100 times normal gravity; Krillin and Gohan continue on their way to Guru, and Vegeta picks up their trail; Frieza gets a report that the Ginyu Force is on its way.

titulo: Semaru chô kessen! Ginyû tokusentai tadaima sanjô!!
descripcion: Vegeta catches up with Krillin and Gohan, and Krillin heads him off while Gohan visits Guru. Also, after sensing the Ginyu Force, Vegeta forges an uneasy alliance with them. Meanwhile, Goku finishes his training and relaxes.

titulo: Gokû ga dai sekkin! Furîza hôi mô o buchi yarube
descripcion: Frieza orders the Ginyu Force to capture Vegeta, take the dragon balls, and kill Gohan and Krillin; Guldo thinks about his dislike for Vegeta; Goku prepares as his ship is on its final approach for Namek; Vegeta, Krillin, and Gohan are confronted by the Ginyu Force.

titulo: Chô majutsu ka torikku ka!? Mr. Gurudo ga okkota zo!
descripcion: Krillin and Gohan fight Guldo; Bulma phones in a report to Roshi; Piccolo senses that Gohan is in danger.

titulo: Môi Rikûmu!! Warukute tsuyokute tondemonai yatsu
descripcion: Vegeta fights Recoome; Frieza investigates the environmental properties of Namek.

titulo: Shinu na Gohan! Gokû, tsui ni kessen-jô ni tôchaku da
descripcion: Gohan fights Recoome; Chi-Chi worries about Gohan; Captain Ginyu delivers the dragon balls to Frieza, who tries to make his wish.

titulo: Keta hazure no tsuyo-sa!! Densetsu no Sûpâ Saija-jin Son Gokû
descripcion: After Goku revives Gohan, Krillin, and Vegeta with senzu beans and gets updated on the situation, he fights Recoome; Dr. Briefs and Chi-Chi contact Bulma.

titulo: Aka to ao no raitoningu bôru! Jîsu to bâta ga Gokû o osou
descripcion: Goku fights Jeice and Burter; Frieza flies toward Guru; Captain Ginyu holds tryouts for the Ginyu Force; Bulma grows impatient while waiting for Gohan and Krillin.

titulo: Tsui ni chokusetsu taiketsu!! Ginyû taichô no odemashi da
descripcion: Start of the "Captain Ginyu Saga". Goku continues to fight Jeice and Burter, and Jeice retreats to warn Captain Ginyu. Goku and Vegeta argue over the fate of the defeated Ginyu Force members, the dragon balls, and fighting Frieza and Bulma reminisces about the old days.

titulo: Susamajî hakuryoku!! Mita ka, Gokû no furu pâwâ
descripcion: Vegeta bails on Goku to follow Gohan and Krillin while Goku fights Captain Ginyu. Meanwhile, Bulma notices on the dragon radar that all of the dragon balls are together, and she decides to go after them.

titulo: Tatakai no yukue!? Sai chôrô ni semaru Furîza no ma no te
descripcion: Goku charges to full power as Captain Ginyu watches. Bulma mourns the atrocities that Frieza has caused. Nail returns to Guru and Gohan and Krillin look for Bulma and her dragon radar. Guru unlocks Dende's hidden power and Frieza fights the Nameks who are guarding Guru.

titulo: Bikkuri!! Gokû ga Ginyû de Ginyû ga Gokû
descripcion: Nail lures Frieza away from Guru, and they fight; Goku fights Captain Ginyu; Bulma is chased by dinosaurs, and she scolds Gohan and Krillin when they show up.

titulo: Ide yo Sûpâ Shenron!! Boku no negai o kanaetamae
descripcion: Vegeta storms Frieza's ship looking for the dragon balls. Gohan and Krillin find the dragon balls and attempt to call Shenron as Vegeta watches. Having switched bodies with Captain Ginyu, Goku rushes to find Ginyu and Jeice before they can get to Gohan and Krillin.

titulo: Yatsu wa ora ja ne~e! Gohan bibiru na chichi o ute!!
descripcion: Gohan and Krillin fight Captain Ginyu, who is still in Goku's body; Vegeta fights Jeice; Nail continues to fight Frieza.

titulo: Dai gosan!! Ginyû ga kaeru ni natchatta
descripcion: Captain Ginyu, back in his own body, allows Vegeta to pound on him until he is ready to attempt another body switch, but Goku has other plans; afterward, everyone prepares to fight Frieza. Meanwhile, Frieza continues to beat on Nail.

titulo: Nanatsu no tama o soroeshi mono yo... Sâ aikotoba o ie!
descripcion: Start of the "Frieza Saga". Goku recovers in the isolation chamber, Gohan guards the dragon balls, and Vegeta rests while they all wait on Krillin's return; Dende looks for Krillin and Gohan; Frieza finishes interrogating Nail.

titulo: Kami-Sama mo ikikaetta! Sûpâ Shenron de Pikkoro ga fukkatsu
descripcion: With Porunga summoned, Krillin, Gohan, and Dende make their wishes after Gohan consults with Piccolo; Vegeta grows angry when he wakes up and realizes what has happened; Frieza flies toward the Z Fighters.

titulo: Saikyô senchi no tanjô ka!? Neiru to Pikkoro ga gattai
descripcion: Frieza powers up while everyone watches; Nail tries to convince Piccolo to merge with him; the battle with Frieza begins.

titulo: Akumu no chô henshin!! Sentô-ryoku 100 man no Furîza
descripcion: Frieza talks about his history with Vegeta's father and his attempted rebellion, and he transforms into a more powerful version of himself; Bulma runs from a dinosaur stampede.

titulo: Koko made ka!? Kyôaku chôzetsu pawâ ga Gohan o osou
descripcion: Frieza tortures Krillin; Yamcha becomes frustrated because he can't help his friends; Bulma despairs; in a rage, Gohan attacks Frieza.

titulo: Ikki ni keisei gyakuten!! Okurete kita senshi, Pikkoro
descripcion: Frieza taunts Vegeta, who stands helpless as he watches Frieza stand over the defeated Gohan. Goku itches to join in the fight. Piccolo rushes to help Gohan as he thinks back on their time together and Krillin rejoins the fight to draw Frieza away from Gohan.

titulo: Pikkoro no jishin! Furîza o taosu no wa ore da
descripcion: Piccolo joins the fray and fights Frieza alone.

titulo: Shutsugeki da Gokû!! Gekido no Furîza ga dai 2 no henshin
descripcion: The battle between Piccolo and Frieza rages on, and Frieza makes his second transformation.

titulo: Kyôfu shiro!! Furîza wa 3-do no henshin de shôbu suru
descripcion: In a rage, Gohan saves Piccolo from Frieza, who makes his final transformation. Meanwhile, Vegeta gets Krillin to attack him so that he can become stronger when Dende heals him.

titulo: Dende no shi... Dete koi! Tobikiri Zenkai pâwâ
descripcion: After Frieza kills Dende, he fights Gohan, Piccolo, Krillin, and Vegeta.

titulo: Machi ni matta ze, kono shunkan!!! Son Gokû ga fukkatsu da
descripcion: Determined to prove that he is a Super Saiyen, Vegeta gives Frieza everything he has.

titulo: Munen...!! Hokori takaki Saiyajin - Bejîta shisu
descripcion: Frieza continues to wail on Vegeta until Goku arrives. After Frieza recognizes Goku as the son of a former opponent, the battle is on. Also, Vegeta, near death, gives a heartfelt speech of remorse for his actions.

titulo: Chô kessen no makuake da!! Omee dake wa ora ga taosu
descripcion: The battle between Goku and Frieza continues after Piccolo, Gohan, and Krillin get out of their way. Also, the entire planet begins to fall apart due to the intensity of the fighting.

titulo: Gekitotsu no 2 dai sûpâ pâwâ! Honki dôshi no nikudansen!!!
descripcion: Goku, realizing that Frieza can't sense him, formulates a plan while he is underwater, but Frieza has some tricks of his own. Meanwhile, despite everyone's best efforts, Chi-Chi is determined to go to Namek.

titulo: Furîza kyôfu no sengen! Te o tsukawazu omae o taosu
descripcion: Goku and Frieza agree to keep the fight on the ground, and Frieza decides to fight without using his hands; Chi-Chi urges Dr. Briefs to fix the ship, which was broken by the Ox King; Yajirobe tries to sneak off while Puar and Oolong talk; Bulma finds Captain Ginyu, who is still in a frog's body.

titulo: Hattari ja nê zo!! Daitan suteki na Yatsu - Son Gokû
descripcion: After Goku refuses to join him, Frieza reveals that he has been using only one percent of his power. He charges to fifty percent, and he and Goku continue to fight. Meanwhile, Captain Ginyu, in Bulma's body, watches the battle as Bulma, in the frog's body, tries to tell Gohan what has happened. Back on Earth, Chi-Chi, Roshi, Yajirobe, Puar, and Oolong prepare for take-off.

titulo: Ketchaku da!! Honô no keshin 20-ban Kaiô Ken no Kamehameha
descripcion: Goku loses hope as he is thrashed by Frieza, and he must rely on his love for his friends and family to summon enough strength to rebound. Meanwhile, Gohan must find a way to return Bulma to her own body.

titulo: Chô tokudai no Genki-Dama Kore ga saigo no kirifuda da!!
descripcion: Weakened from using kaio-ken X20, Goku takes a beating from Frieza until he receives a vision from Vegeta. Meanwhile, the Ginyu Force arrives on King Kai's planet.

titulo: Chansu o ikase!! Pikkoro sutemi no engo shageki
descripcion: Goku gathers energy for his spirit bomb. Meanwhile, the Ginyu Force tests its powers on King Kai's planet.

titulo: Genki-Dama no chô hakai-ryoku!! Ikinokotta no wa dare da!?
descripcion: Piccolo holds off Frieza while Goku finishes forming the spirit bomb. Meanwhile, Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu fight the Ginyu Force.

titulo: Tsui ni henshin!! Densetsu no Sûpâ Saiya-jin: Son Gokû
descripcion: Goku, Krillin, Piccolo, and Gohan celebrate the defeat of Frieza, but they may be celebrating too soon. Meanwhile, Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu continue fighting the Ginyu Force.

titulo: Ikari bakuhatsu!! Gokû yo, min'na no kataki o utte kure
descripcion: Goku, now a Super Saiyan, takes out his anger on Frieza; Gohan takes Piccolo to safety; Roshi senses Goku's new power.

titulo: Namekku-sei shômetsu ka!? Daichi o tsuranuku ma no senkô
descripcion: Frieza realizes that he can't defeat Goku, so he decides to destroy Namek; Gohan drops off Piccolo on the ship and looks for Bulma; there is a calamity at Frieza's base.

titulo: Katsu no wa ore da... Ikinokori o kaketa saishû kôgeki
descripcion: Goku and Frieza continue to fight as the planet falls apart around them, and Frieza charges to one hundred percent power. Meanwhile, Gohan searches for Bulma.

titulo: Shenron yo ushû o hashire!! Semaru Namekku-sei shômetsu no toki
descripcion: While Goku and Frieza continue to fight, Kami and King Kai discuss how they should use the wish from the dragon balls that Mr. Popo has collected. Also, Gohan and Bulma return to the ship and try to get it working.

titulo: Boku wa Son Gokû no musuko da!! Gohan, futatabi kessenjô e
descripcion: Goku and Frieza continue to fight; Gohan, no longer sensing his dad's power level, decides to leave the ship and face Frieza himself; Shenron works on granting the wish.

titulo: Ore wa hono koshi ni nokoru!! Shôri e no saigo no negai
descripcion: While fighting Frieza, Goku asks King Kai to change the wish to allow him to stay on the planet and finish the fight. Guru relays this to Dende, who must make the wish before Frieza notices that the dragon is back.

titulo: Tokoton yarô ze!! Kieyuku hoshi ni nokotta futari
descripcion: Goku and Frieza continue to fight; Guru explains the wish to everyone who was brought to Earth; Piccolo thinks back on everything he and Goku have been through together; Vegeta explains his plan for when Goku and Frieza are dead.

titulo: Aware Furîza!! Furuedashitara tomoranai!!
descripcion: Goku and Frieza continue to fight, and Goku offers Frieza one last chance to live. Also, King Kai recaps Frieza's plan to destroy Namek. Back on Earth, the superstitious Bulma burns leaves and watches the burn pattern to determine if Goku will return from the battle.

titulo: Gokû no shôri sengen da!! Furîza ga jimetsu suru toki...
descripcion: Goku and Frieza continue to fight, with Goku trying to avoid Frieza's energy discs. Back on Earth, Vegeta thinks back on his hatred for Frieza, and he remembers the moment when he decided that he wanted to become strong enough to defeat Frieza.

titulo: Furîza yabureru!! Subete no ikari o kometa ichigeki
descripcion: Lying in pieces on the ground, the defeated Frieza taunts Goku, who is walking away. Frieza then thinks back on the fight. Back on Earth, the dying Guru appoints a new leader for the Nameks.

titulo: Namekku-sei dai bakuhatsu!! Uchû ni kieta Gokû
descripcion: As Goku is trying to escape from Namek, King Kai relates the action to Tien, Yamcha, and Chiaotzu. Afterward, Yamcha telepathically recounts it to Bulma through King Kai. Also, Gohan gets into a fight with Vegeta.

titulo: Ikite ita Son Gokû Z senchi ga zen'nin fukkatsu da!!
descripcion: Vegeta suggests a plan to bring Goku back; Bulma invites Vegeta and the Nameks to stay with her until they can relocate; the Namekian dragon balls are used to bring Yamcha, Krillin, Tien, and Chiaotzu back and to relocate the Nameks.

titulo: Tenkai ga taihen da!! Gârikku Jr ga Kami ni naru!?
descripcion: Start of the "Garlic Jr. Saga". Garlic Jr. has returned from the Dead Zone to hatch a sinister plot of revenge upon those responsible for his defeat; Gohan meets up with Krillin and Krillin's girlfriend Maron; Piccolo splits himself in four and spars with himself, and he meets with Kami; Garlic Jr. and his goons invade the Lookout; there is a reunion party at Roshi's, but Chi-Chi won't let Gohan go.

titulo: Kyôfu no kuroi kiri...!! Min'na mazoku ni natchatta
descripcion: As the black water mist spreads, Garlic Jr. reveals his plan to wish his father back and to get revenge on Goku and Gohan; Gohan and Icarus run into a group of animals who have been affected by the mist; Kami tells Mr. Popo that the Serpent race that Garlic Jr. belongs to has long been an evil race that wants only destruction; Chi-Chi arrives at Roshi's house looking for Gohan, and she is offended by Maron before everyone on the island breathes the mist.

titulo: Tenkai ga senjô da!! Pikkoro ga mazoku ni gyakumodori...
descripcion: Spice reveals to Piccolo how Garlic Jr. escaped from the Dead Zone using the Makyo Star; Krillin and Gohan go to the Lookout to find the sacred water while Piccolo stays behind to fight; in outer space, Vegeta looks for Goku.

titulo: Pikkoro to chokusetsu taiketsu! Tenkai ni ikari no Masenkô
descripcion: Gohan and Krillin fight the Spice Boys; Yajirobe and Korin cook for Maron; Vegeta trains on a distant planet while looking for answers.

titulo: Min'na no kokoro o torimodose!! Shinden ni nemuru chô shinzui
descripcion: Gohan fights Piccolo while Krillin tries to save Kami and Mr. Popo from Garlic Jr. Also, Yajirobe and Korin play cards with Maron.

titulo: Asa made matenai!! Kami-Sama no kakugo o kimeta kesshikô
descripcion: Piccolo explains to Gohan what his plan was; Piccolo, Gohan, and Krillin hold off Garlic Jr., Spice, and Vinegar while Kami and Mr. Popo take the sacred water to the seven air currents of the world; Vegeta fights a group of Frieza's thugs while he searches for Goku.

titulo: Chô kageki ni shôbu da!! Okite yaburi no Kami-Sama
descripcion: Gohan, Krillin, and Piccolo fight with Garlic Jr., Spice, and Vinegar, all three of whom are now powered up. Meanwhile, Kami and Mr. Popo carry the sacred water through the realm of the dead guardians of Earth in an attempt to reach the seven air currents, but the former guardians attempt to drain Kami's life force and keep him there forever.

titulo: Kîta ze chô-shinsui!! Sekai ga akumu kara sameta
descripcion: Gohan, Krillin, and Piccolo fight Garlic, Jr. Meanwhile, Kami tries to convince the former guardians of the Earth to allow him to spread the sacred water.

titulo: Gohan ni isshun no shôki!! Ano Makyô-sei o ute...
descripcion: Gohan keeps his shield up to prevent himself, Krillin, and Piccolo from being sucked into the dead zone, but Piccolo tries to convince him to lower the shield and to destroy the Makyo Star, thus destroying the source of Garlic, Jr.'s, power. Meanwhile, Kami struggles to survive as he is tortured by the former guardians of Earth.

titulo: Otoko da nê... Kuririn 101-kaime no puropôzu
descripcion: Krillin goes shopping with Maron, and he contemplates marriage. Also, everyone is called to the Kame house for Turtle's 1000th birthday party. While there, Krillin goes deep sea diving with Gohan in search of the Mermaid's Tear, the world's largest pearl, which he plans to give to Maron.

titulo: Are ga chikyû da yo papa... Furîza oyako no gyakushû
descripcion: Start of the "Trunks Saga". While thinking about his decision to break up with Maron, Krillin trains hard to improve his Kamehameha wave. Chi-Chi gets Gohan a tutor named Mr. Shu, who is very strict. Bulma tells Yamcha about a dream she had of Vegeta. Vegeta returns to Earth in search of Goku and a revitalized Frieza sets his sights on Earth.

titulo: Furîza wa boku ga taosu... Gokû o matsu nazo no shônen
descripcion: The Z Warriors fly to the suspected sight of the upcoming battle, Frieza and King Cold land their ship, and both sides prepare for battle.

titulo: Furîza o ittô ryôdan!! Mô hitori no Sûpâ Saiya-jin
descripcion: The mysterious warrior fights Frieza and his goons. Meanwhile, the Z Warriors detect his power level and move toward the fight.

titulo: Ossu!! Hisashiburi... Kaette kita Son Gokû
descripcion: The mysterious Super Saiyan fights King Cold, and everyone waits on Goku's return.

titulo: Boku no chichi wa Bejîta desu... Nazo no shônen no kokuhaku
descripcion: After testing his strength against Goku, the Super Saiyan reveals himself to be Trunks, the son of Bulma and Vegeta from the future. He warns Goku of an upcoming battle with the Androids, which will determine the fate of the entire world.

titulo: Gokû no shin hissatsuwaza!? Mite kure, ore no Shunkanidô
descripcion: Goku tells of his escape from Namek and his time spent on the planet Yardrat, and he demonstrates the Instant Transmission technique, which the people of Yardrat taught him. Also, the Z Warriors formulate a plan to fight the Androids, and they all leave to train for the upcoming battle.

titulo: Koete yaru... Gokû o!! Sentô minzoku Saiya-jin no Ô
descripcion: In a desperate attempt to become a Super Saiyan, Vegeta begins a grueling training regiment. Despite suffering from injuries, he carries on as Bulma tries to convince him to slow down. Also, Yamcha watches him train and tries to keep up. Meanwhile, Goku, Gohan, and Piccolo train together.

titulo: Menkyo kaiden? Gokû no arata naru shiren
descripcion: On her way home from the grocery, Chi-Chi is chased by a wild boar. Mad that she doesn't have a car, she makes a deal with Goku and Piccolo that she will keep doing their chores if they get their driver's licenses. Meanwhile, Vegeta keeps training hard.

titulo: Kehai o motanu satsujinki Doitsu ga jinzôningen da!?
descripcion: The Z Warriors arrive at the designated spot to wait for the Androids, who appear and start their attack on the city.

titulo: Reiketsu 20-gô no akugyaku hidô!! Gokû · ikari no chô-henshin
descripcion: The rest of the Z Warriors arrive to save Yamcha. Krillin takes him to safety while the others lead the Androids away from the city.

titulo: Gokû, daburu shokku!! Yamai to teki no hasamiuchi
descripcion: Goku fights Android No. 19. Meanwhile, Roshi tells Maron, who has shown up at his house looking for Krillin, about the Red Ribbon Army.

titulo: Bejîta tsuyoshi!! Mezameru Sûpâ Saiya-jin no chi
descripcion: Goku fights against his virus as Android No. 19 beats him up, and Vegeta steps in to save him. Meanwhile, Yajirobe plays with baby Trunks, and he drives Bulma to see the battle.

titulo: 20-gô no futeki na warai... Dokutâ Gero no himitsu
descripcion: Vegeta fights the Androids as Yamcha flies Goku home to get the antidote for his virus.

titulo: Jijitsu wa mirai yori osoroshî!? Torankusu no giwaku
descripcion: The Z Fighters look for Android 20 as he watches them and determines who he will steal power from, and he fights Piccolo; Trunks returns; Goku gets his medicine.

titulo: Tsuigeki!! Dokutâ Gero nazo no kenkyûjo o sagashidase
descripcion: During the confusion after the explosion of Bulma's ship, Android 20 retreats to activate Androids 17 and 18; Trunks grows angry with Vegeta for not trying to save Bulma; the Z Fighters debate their next move.

titulo: Soshite kyôfu ga genjitsu ni... Mezameru 17-gô to 18-gô!!
descripcion: The Z Fighters look for Dr. Gero's lab while he tries to beat them there; Gohan flies Bulma, baby Trunks, and Yajirobe home; Goku fights the virus.

titulo: Subete ga teokure ka!? Gokû o korosu saishû heiki
descripcion: After Androids 17 and 18 mutiny on Dr. Gero, they activate Android 16 and go after Goku. Vegeta follows the Androids while Goku continues to fight the virus as Chi-Chi cooks for him. Gohan stops so that Bulma and Yajirobe can change Trunks' diaper.

titulo: Kawaî kao de chô pâwâ!? 18-gô ni shikaku nashi
descripcion: Vegeta fights Android 18 while the rest of the Z Fighters fly toward the battle; Gohan continues to fly Bulma, Trunks, and Yajirobe home; Maron surfs while she stays at Roshi's house.

titulo: Darenimo yatsura o tomerarenai... Z Senshi zenmetsu ka!?
descripcion: The rest of the Z Fighters jump in to help Vegeta, and Android 17 joins the fight; Turtle saves Maron from drowning and fights off two guys who are trying to pick her up.

titulo: Pikkoro no ketsui!! Totte oki no saigo no shudan
descripcion: Krillin heals everyone with senzu beans. Vegeta flies off in a rage and Piccolo goes to the Lookout to speak with Kami. Krillin, Trunks, and Tien go to pick up Goku, who is still fighting the virus while Maron leaves Roshi's house. Gohan drops off Bulma, baby Trunks, and Yajirobe at Dr. Brief's house.

titulo: Aruku chô hakai heiki!! Jinzôningen ga Gokû ni semaru
descripcion: Piccolo tries to convince Kami to merge with him; Tien goes to pick up Chiaotzu while Krillin and Trunks continue on to pick up Goku; the Androids hijack a truck, and they run afoul of a motorcycle gang.

titulo: Fukitsu na yokan! Buruma ga shiraseta misuterî
descripcion: Tien picks up Chiaotzu while the rest of the Z Fighters fly to Roshi's house as Trunks thinks about his world and how to defeat the Androids. Goku dreams about the Androids and the Androids in turn continue driving to Goku's house. Vegeta vows to ascend to an even more powerful level and Bulma reports a strange finding to Krillin and Trunks.

titulo: Jâku no tamago o hakken!! Kyôfu suru Torankusu
descripcion: Start of the "Imperfect Cell Saga". Trunks, Gohan, and Bulma investigate the 2nd time machine; Goku is flown to Roshi's house; the Androids continue driving to Goku's hose; Kami, while considering Piccolo's suggestion, tells of a new disturbance that he senses.

titulo: Katsute nai teki ni mukete... Sûpâ Namekku-seijin tanjô!!
descripcion: The Androids battle with the police after No. 18 steals a dress; Bulma and everyone at Roshi's house, while watching the news on the television, see a crisis unfold at Gingertown; Piccolo and Kami merge.

titulo: Kamehameha!? Gokû no Ki o motsu monsutâ
descripcion: Piccolo faces the creature in Gingertown; the Z Warriors sense the creature's power level, but they can't determine who or what it is, sensing him as a combination of their friends and foes; Trunks and Krillin fly to Gingertown; Android No. 16 picks up Piccolo's and the creature's power levels.

titulo: Zôo to hakai no seimei-tai!! Yatsu no na wa Jinzôningen Seru
descripcion: The creature grabs Piccolo, draining his life force as a group of tanks enters the city and shoots at him. Also, the creature explains his origin to Piccolo. Meanwhile, Goku lies in bed recovering, and Gohan watches the TV news report on the crisis.

titulo: Pikkoro tsûkon no dai shippai! Seru ga machi ni hanatareta!
descripcion: Krillin and Trunks arrive to help Piccolo, but Cell leaves to recharge his energy before he takes on the Androids. Also, Piccolo explains what Cell is to the other Z Warriors.

titulo: Seru tanjô no himitsu! Kenkyûjo no chika ni nani ga aru!?
descripcion: Vegeta leaves to train by himself; Trunks and Krillin go to Gero's lab to destroy the fetus Cell from the present so that he cannot be born; Piccolo and Tien chase after the matured Cell from the future; Cell goes to Nickytown to restore his energy.

titulo: Gokû tatakai e no mezame! Sûpa Saiya-jin o koero!!
descripcion: Cell runs amok in Nickytown; Krillin saves a young girl and her little brother and fights Cell; Piccolo and Tien arrive to help Krillin; Trunks contemplates recent events as he looks for Vegeta; the Androids drive through the woods while looking for Goku's house; the Z Warriors look for Cell; Goku awakens.

titulo: Shugyô o isoge Saiya-jin! Seishin to toki no heya de...
descripcion: Goku rounds up Gohan, Trunks, and Vegeta and takes them to the Lookout, where they will train in the Time Chamber in hopes of reaching a level beyond that of a Super Saiyan. Meanwhile, the other Z Warriors look for Cell in an amusement park. Also, the Androids continue looking for Goku.

titulo: Ten o saku gekiretsu kôdan!! Pikkoro VS Jinzôningen 17-gô
descripcion: Piccolo fights Android 17. Meanwhile, Goku and Gohan wait for Trunks and Vegeta to finish their training in the Time Chamber. Also, Bulma works on deciphering the schematics for the Androids.

titulo: Kono hi o matte ita!! Seru · kanzentai e no jokyoku
descripcion: Piccolo continues fighting Android 17 as Cell flies toward them. Meanwhile, Bulma finishes deciphering the Android schematics, and Goku and Gohan continue waiting on Trunks and Vegeta.

titulo: Sutemi no hangeki oyobazu! Pikkoro moetsukiru!!
descripcion: Cell fights Piccolo and Android 17. Meanwhile, Krillin goes to meet Bulma to get the remote control, and Tien goes to help Piccolo.

titulo: Nokosareta yuîtsu no nozomi... Mugon no senshi 16-gô tatsu!!
descripcion: Goku, Gohan, and Mr. Popo all express anger and sadness at the defeat of Piccolo; Bulma flies toward the Z Warriors with the remote control; Cell fights Androids 17 and 16.

titulo: 17-gô o nomikonda... Henshin Seru wa chô gurume
descripcion: Android 16 and Tien fight Cell in an attempt to protect Androids 17 and 18.

titulo: Ashita wa omê o tatakinomesu!! Gokû no chôsenjô
descripcion: Start of the "Perfect Cell Saga". Tien holds off Cell as Androids 16 and 18 escape, and Yamcha, Chiaotzu, Goku, and Gohan all debate helping him. Meanwhile, Krillin gets the remote from Bulma.

titulo: Subete ore ga katazukeru!! Shinsei Bejîta oyako shutsugen
descripcion: After Bulma brings them new Saiyan armor, Vegeta and Trunks go after Cell as Goku and Gohan prepare to enter the Time Chamber. Meanwhile, Cell looks for the Androids.

titulo: Ikinari zenkai!! Hikari kagayaku Bejîta no chô pâwâ
descripcion: Vegeta challenges Cell, who is still looking for the Androids. Meanwhile, Goku gives Gohan a pep talk in the Time Chamber.

titulo: Seru yo hizamazuke! Ore wa Sûpâ Bejîta da!!
descripcion: Vegeta fights Cell while Trunks recalls his experiences in the Time Chamber. Meanwhile, Goku trains Gohan in the Chamber.

titulo: Kiken'na puraido!! Kanzentai Seru e no chôsen
descripcion: Vegeta continues his fight with Cell. In the Time Chamber, Goku trains his Kamehameha Wave, and Gohan convinces Goku to let him train harder after having a dream of almost becoming a Super Saiyan.

titulo: Ore nayanjau!! Kuririn no 18-gô hakai kôsaku
descripcion: Cell tries to convince Vegeta to allow him to absorb Android 18 in order to reach his perfect form, thus giving Vegeta the challenge he desires. Meanwhile, Krillin tries to get close enough to the Androids to use the remote and destroy 18, but his feelings for her get in the way.

titulo: Zen uchû ni shôgeki!! Seru, kanzentai e kyôi no shinka
descripcion: Having convinced Vegeta to step aside, Cell goes after Android 18. Trunks tries to stop Cell, but Vegeta, wanting Cell to reach his perfect form, fends Trunks off.

titulo: Sentô-ryoku mugendai!! Seru to iu na no hakaishin tanjô
descripcion: Cell completes his transformation. In the Time Chamber, Gohan pushes Goku to train him harder.

titulo: Sûpâ Bejîta ayaushi!! Kanzen muketsu no kyôfu ga semaru!!
descripcion: Trunks revives Krillin while Vegeta fights Cell. In the Time Chamber, Goku and Gohan train together as Super Saiyans.

titulo: Sûpâ Saiya-jin no genkai toppa!! Arashi o yobu Torankusu
descripcion: Vegeta makes a final attempt to defeat Cell as Trunks waits for the right time to step in.

titulo: Chichi o sukue!! Ten o mo kogasu Torankusu no ikari
descripcion: Trunks powers up and fights Cell while Krillin takes Vegeta to safety. In the Time Chamber, Goku and Gohan continue to train.

titulo: Zetsubô no mirai!! Jigoku o ikinuita otoko Torankusu
descripcion: Trunks reflects on his past and why he is in this dimension, and Cell does the same.

titulo: Sûpâ Torankusu ni jakuten!! Seru, shôgeki no bakudan hatsugen
descripcion: Trunks continues to fight Cell while Krillin revives Vegeta with a senzu bean. In the Time Chamber, Goku discovers a weakness in the new form that he and Trunks have mastered.

titulo: Gokû ni semaru daikessen!! Shin Tenka'ichi Budôkai no nazo
descripcion: Start of the "Cell Games Saga". Trunks explains Cell's tournament to the Z Fighters; Krillin takes Android 16 to Bulma so that she can repair him; Goku and Gohan continue to train in the Time Chamber; Roshi recaps the events of the previous World Martial Arts Tournaments; Cell builds an arena for his tournament.

titulo: Shichô-ritsu 100%!! Shi o yobe Seru Gêmu dokusen namahôsô
descripcion: Dr. Brief takes a look at Android 16; Yamcha and Krillin decide to train; Gohan has a bad dream about Cell; Cell announces his tournament on TV.

titulo: Gokû to Gohan... Hîrô oyako kyûkyoku reberu appu
descripcion: Goku and Gohan emerge from the Time Chamber, and Goku uses his instant transmission to pay a visit to Cell in order to see how powerful he is in his perfect form; meanwhile, people are fleeing from the cities and Dr. Brief and Bulma run tests on Android 16.

titulo: Gokû no yoyû!? Yasunde matou Seru Gêmu
descripcion: Goku asks Korin to compare his strength to Cell's. He and Gohan then pick up Chi-Chi from Roshi's, and they spend the rest of the day relaxing and fishing with Krillin. Meanwhile, Cell trains in space.

titulo: Senshi no kyûsoku... Shôjo to uso to Gohan no ketsui
descripcion: While on an errand for his mom, Gohan stops in Chazke Village. He finds that Mr. Bourbon, the tycoon who runs the city, has built a shelter to protect the town from Cell, and that he manipulates the townspeople into doing what he wants. To make matters worse, he has hired General Tao as his right hand man. Along with an elderly shopkeeper named Lao and Lao's granddaughter Lime, Gohan tries to convince the people of Bourbon's and Tao's treachery, and that the shelter won't protect them from Cell.

titulo: Himerareta chikara!! Gohan ga akanbô datta koro
descripcion: Chi-Chi kicks Goku out of the house so that she can prepare for Gohan's birthday party. She looks through a photo album and thinks back on how she and Goku chose Gohan's name. Meanwhile, Goku fishes with Krillin, and he recalls a time when he lost control of Gohan's stroller.

titulo: Kami-Sama o sagashidase!! Gokû, dai shunkanidô
descripcion: Piccolo emerges from the Time Chamber, and Vegeta enters; Bulma works on Android 16; Goku, Gohan, Krillin, and Chi-Chi have a picnic; the military attacks Cell; Goku sets out to find a new guardian for Earth.

titulo: Dende no hatsu shigoto!! Doragon Bôru fukkatsu da
descripcion: Goku takes Dende to the Lookout, then takes Gohan and Krillin to see him. At the Lookout, Dende recreates the dragon balls, and Goku goes after them. Meanwhile, Mr. Hercule Satan, the champion of the most recent World Martial Arts Tournament, announces his entry into the Cell Games.

titulo: Gokû ni nanmon!? Doragon Bôru o tori modose
descripcion: As Goku looks for the dragon balls, he runs into General Tao, who is collecting the dragon balls for a gangster. Meanwhile, Vegeta emerges from the Time Chamber, and Hercule Satan plays to a crowd.

titulo: Seru ni idomo mono-tachi!! Kessen no makuake
descripcion: The Z Fighters fly to the Cell Games, and Hercule Satan taunts Cell.

titulo: Chotto matta!! Satan gundan oabare
descripcion: Two of Hercule Satan's students, Piroshki and Caroni, arrive, and all three fight Cell.

titulo: Shôbuda Gokû!! Chô kinpaku Seru Gêmu
descripcion: The fight between Goku and Cell begins.

titulo: Chikyû chokugeki!! Seru no tokudai Kamehameha
descripcion: After powering up, Goku and Cell continue to fight. Cell uses Tien's Multi-Form Technique, Frieza's energy disk, and the Kamehameha Wave.

titulo: Haiboku ka shi ka!? Gokû, gyakuten no hisaku
descripcion: Goku and Cell speed up their fighting, and Cell destroys the arena. Meanwhile, Dende watches from the Lookout.

titulo: Shitô ni ketchaku!! Gokû no kôsan sengen!?
descripcion: Cell regenerates and continues to fight as Goku's energy dwindles.

titulo: Saikyô o tsugu mono... Sono na wa Gohan
descripcion: Goku bows out, and Gohan steps in to fight Cell.

titulo: Ikare Gohan nemureru chikara o yobi okose
descripcion: Gohan fights Cell, and he tells Cell about the dramatic increase in his power when he is angered.

titulo: Chitcha na kyôi!! Seru Junia raishû
descripcion: Cell tries to anger Gohan in order to see his true power, and Android 16 joins the fight.

titulo: 16-gô muzan!! Ugokidasu ikari no Sûpâ Gohan
descripcion: The Cell Juniors attack the Z Fighters.

titulo: Fukiareru shin no chikara!! Seru Junia funsai
descripcion: Having reached a higher power level through his anger, Gohan single-handedly takes on the Cell Juniors.

titulo: Seru o KO!! Tatta 2-hatsu no chô tekken
descripcion: Gohan fights Cell, who charges to his full power, and Trunks revives the other Z Fighters with senzu beans.

titulo: Seru ni ihen!! Kuzusareta kansentai
descripcion: Gohan walks through Cell's best attacks like they are nothing, so Cell tries to destroy the Earth.

titulo: Bai bai min'na!! Gokû saigo no shinkanidô
descripcion: Having been reverted to his imperfect form after Gohan's last attack, Cell, in a last ditch effort, again tries to destroy the Earth, and Goku must stop him.

titulo: Hakuchû no akumu!! Kyôfu wa yori kanpeki ni
descripcion: Cell explains how he survived the blast, and Vegeta, filled with rage over Cell's attack on Trunks, goes ballistic and fights Cell.

titulo: Gokû kara Gohan e... Chichi no tamashî wa tsutawatta
descripcion: Cell explains how he traveled to this time-line and how he reached his perfect form, and Goku telepathically gives Gohan an inspirational speech. Meanwhile, Fortune Teller Baba lets Chi-Chi watch the battle through her crystal ball.

titulo: Tataki wa owatta... Arigatô Son Gokû
descripcion: Gohan and Cell match energy waves, and each one struggles for control. Also, the other Z Fighters help Gohan.

titulo: Ora ano yo de shûgyô suru!! Egao no wakare
descripcion: Krillin, Yamcha, Tien, and Piccolo take Android 18, Gohan, and Trunks to the Lookout so that Dende can heal them, and they all summon the eternal dragon to undo the damage that Cell caused. Vegeta, angered by the death of Goku and embarrassed by his inferiority to Gohan and Cell, vows to never fight again. Hercule Satan takes the credit for Cell's defeat.

titulo: Atarashî hibi... Tôsan! Boku ganbaru
descripcion: After Krillin uses the second wish to remove the bomb from inside Android 18, the Z Fighters all go their separate ways--Gohan goes home to tell Chi-Chi about Goku's death, and he spends time with the Ox King. Trunks goes back to his own time; and Piccolo remains at the Lookout. Meanwhile, Hercule Satan displays his martial arts skills on TV, and Goku and King Kai decide to build a house in Other World.

titulo: Môhitotsu no ketsumatsu!! Mirai wa ore ga mamoru
descripcion: Back in his own time, Trunks fights the Androids and Cell. Meanwhile, Goku and King Kai decide to travel across Other World.

titulo: Dai kangeki!! Ita zo! Ano yo no sugê yatsu
descripcion: Start of the "Great Saiyaman Saga". After King Kai explains to Goku that there are actually four Kais and one Grand Kai, they go to visit the Grand Kai's planet. There, Kai has words with West Kai, Goku meets a fighter named Pikkon, and Goku and Pikkon go to hell to stop Cell and Frieza, who are running amok.

titulo: Anoyo ichi wa ora da!! Rekidai no yûsha dai shûgô
descripcion: Goku meets the other warriors from the North quadrant, and the other Kais give King Kai grief for being dead. The Kais propose a tournament to be held amongst the warriors on the planet, and Goku races East Kai to determine if he deserves to be included.

titulo: Dai Kaiô-sei nekkyô!! Makiokose Gokû senpû
descripcion: The quarter-finals of the Other World Tournament begin: Torbie faces Tapkar, Froug faces Maraikoh, Arqua faces Goku, and Pikkon faces Olibu.

titulo: Honô no kesshô!! Gokû ka Paikûhan ka!?
descripcion: The semi-finals of the Other World Tournament begin: Goku faces Maraikoh, and Pikkon faces Torbie. Also, the finals begin.

titulo: Nogasu na shôri!! Kimero chôsoku Kamehameha
descripcion: Goku faces Pikkon in the finals of the Other World Tournament.

titulo: Are kara 7-nen! Kyô kara boku wa kôkôsei
descripcion: After foiling a bank robbery, Gohan tries to fit in and make friends on his first day of high school, all while trying to hide his powers from everyone.

titulo: Ai to seigi no Gurêto Saiyaman sanjô
descripcion: Gohan gets Bulma to make a costume for him, and he takes it for a spin. While patrolling, he prevents a crazy driver from causing too much damage, and he stops a bus hijacking with Videl.

titulo: Gohan no hachamecha hatsu dêto!?
descripcion: When Gohan's classmate Angela learns his big secret, she blackmails him into going on a date. As Saiyaman, Gohan helps put out a building fire with Videl.

titulo: Gohan, kinkyû shutsudô! Bîderu o sukue!!
descripcion: Videl follows Saiyaman in an attempt to learn his identity. Also, the Red Shark Gang holds the mayor hostage, and Gohan (as Saiyaman) and Videl must rescue him.

titulo: Tônan jiken hassei!! Han'nin wa Saiyaman!?
descripcion: Gohan steals a baby dinosaur from the circus in an attempt to return him to his parents before they go on a rampage, and he is chased by Videl and the police.

titulo: Gokû mo fukkatsu!? Tenka'ichi Budôkai shitsujô da!!
descripcion: Gohan gets Bulma to make him a new costume for the World Martial Arts Tournament, and Vegeta announces his entry into the tournament. Also, Goku announces that he will be allowed to come back to Earth for one day to compete, and Gohan, while on the way to tell his friends of Goku's return, stumbles onto the set of a Great Saiyaman movie.

titulo: Gohan mo bikkuri! Goten no bakuhatsu pawâ
descripcion: The Z Fighters train for the upcoming World Martial Arts Tournament. While training, Gohan finds out some surprising information regarding Goten.

titulo: A tobeta!! Bîderu no bukujutsu nyûmon
descripcion: Gohan teaches Goten and Videl to fly; Goku trains in Other World as King Kai challenges South Kai to enter his new fighter in the World Martial Arts Tournament with Goku; Vegeta and Trunks train in the gravity chamber.

titulo: Okaeri Gokû! Zetto chîmu zen'in shûgô!!
descripcion: The Z Fighters finish their training and go to the World Martial Arts Tournament.

titulo: Ayaushi Saiyaman! Gekisha ni goyôjin!?
descripcion: After failing to woo Videl, Sharpener tries to discover the identity of Saiyaman as all of the fighters attempt to earn a spot in the World Martial Arts Tournament by scoring highly on a machine that measures striking power.

titulo: Hanpa janai ze!! Chibi Torankusu
descripcion: The start of the "World Tournament Saga". The Junior World Martial Arts Tournament begins, and a filmed reenactment of the Cell Games, with Mr. Satan as the hero, is played on a giant TV screen.

titulo: Boku no deban da!! Goten, kinchô no daîssen
descripcion: Trunks and Goten rapidly advance to the finals of the Junior World Martial Arts Tournament, and the finals begin.

titulo: Ureshisa hyakumanbai! Shônen chanpion kettei!!
descripcion: Trunks and Goten continue fighting in the finals of the Junior World Martial Arts Tournament.

titulo: Dô suru Satan!? Shijô saidai no pinchi
descripcion: Having won the Junior World Martial Arts Tournament, Trunks gets to fight Mr. Satan in an exhibition match. Also, as the Z Fighters prepare for their own matches, they meet two other mysterious fighters.

titulo: Taisen aite kettei!! Hayaku yarô ze ikkaisen
descripcion: Trunks and Goten figure out a way to compete in the adult portion of the World Martial Arts Tournament, and all of the qualified fighters draw to see who will fight whom in the first round.

titulo: Dô shita Pikkoro!! Masa ka no fusenpai
descripcion: The first round of the World Martial Arts Tournament begins, with Krillin facing Pintar and Piccolo facing Shin.

titulo: Fujimi de bukimi!? Supopobitchi no nazo
descripcion: The first round of the World Martial Arts Tournament continues with Videl fighting Spopovitch. Also, Shin's true identity is revealed to Piccolo.

titulo: Bîderu muzan!! Deru ka ikari no sûpâ Gohan
descripcion: Videl and Spopovitch continue their fight in the first round of the World Martial Arts Tournament.

titulo: Barechatta!! Saiyaman wa Son Gohan
descripcion: Goku returns from Korin's Tower with some senzu beans, and Gohan takes them to Videl; Mr. Satan stays with Videl in the hospital; Spopovitch and Yamu monitor the power levels of the other fighters in the tournament; Gohan and Kibito get in the ring.

titulo: Ugomeku inbô!! Gohan no pawâ ga ubawareta
descripcion: After Gohan goes Super Saiyan, Spopovitch and Yamu drain his energy and fly away. Afterward, the Z Warriors follow them to see where they're going, and the mystery behind the recent events is explained to them by Shin and Kibito.

titulo: Kuromaku tôjô!! Aku no madôshi Babidi
descripcion: Start of the "Babidi Saga". The Z Fighters follow Spopovitch and Yamu to Babidi, and, while observing their meeting, they see some of Babidi's other henchmen. Back at the tournament, the crowd grows restless while waiting for the next fight.

titulo: Machiukeru wana!! Makai kara no chôsenjô
descripcion: After Dabura neutralizes Kibito, Krillin, and Piccolo, the other Z Fighters follow him into Babidi's spaceship.

titulo: Nameru na!! Bejîta ikari no shosen toppa
descripcion: Vegeta fights Pui Pui in Stage One of Babidi's ship. Back at the tournament, Goten and Trunks look for a place to relax.

titulo: Gokû pawâ zenkai!! Buttobe Yakon
descripcion: Goku fights Yakon in Stage Two of Babidi's ship. Back at the tournament, Trunks and Goten eat their way into trouble.

titulo: Dai gosan!! Satan VS 3-nin no chô senshi!?
descripcion: The Z Warriors wait on the Stage Three opponent, Dabura, as he meditates to gain strength. Back at the tournament, the five remaining fighters--Killa, Jewel, Mr. Satan, Mighty Mask, and Android 18--begin a battle royale to determine the winner of the tournament.

titulo: Tsuyoi ze chibikko!! 18-gô dai kusen!?
descripcion: The Z Fighters continue to wait on Dabura, who is still meditating. Back at the tournament, Android 18 fights Goten and Trunks (disguised as Mighty Mask) in the battle royale, as Mr. Satan sits back and watches.

titulo: Tachihadakaru Maô! Deban da Gohan!!
descripcion: Android 18 fights Mr. Satan in the World Martial Arts Tournament; after seeing each other while flying, Videl tells Trunks and Goten where their fathers are; the fight between Gohan and Dabura begins.

titulo: Mitsukerareta jashin!! Dâbura no meian
descripcion: Gohan's fight with Dabura continues. During the fight, Dabura notices that Vegeta has a dark side.

titulo: Hakai Ôji Bejîta fukkatsu!! Butô-kai ran'nyû
descripcion: Babidi takes over Vegeta's mind, and he transports the Z Fighters back to the tournament.

titulo: Shukumei no chô taiketsu!! Gekitotsu Gokû VS Bejîta
descripcion: Goku attempts to talk Vegeta into breaking Babidi's control over him while Babidi tries to convince Vegeta to kill the Supreme Kai.

titulo: Mattero Babidi!! Yabô wa yurusanai
descripcion: Goku fights Vegeta. Also, Gohan and the Supreme Kai make it to the inner sanctum of Babidi's ship.

titulo: Toketa fûin! Deru zo kyôaku Majin Bû!!
descripcion: Goku and Vegeta continue to fight, giving Majin Buu the energy he needs to hatch.

titulo: Fukkatsu sasenai!! Teikô no Kamehameha
descripcion: Gohan tries to destroy Majin Buu's egg before it hatches; Goku and Vegeta continue to fight; Mr. Satan reassures the crowd at the tournament; Trunks and Goten try to find the battle.

titulo: Zetsubô e itchokusen!? Nageki no Kaiôshin
descripcion: Majin Buu easily pummels Dabura; Goku tries to convince Vegeta to stop fighting with him so that they can concentrate on Majin Buu; Mr. Satan reflects on his experiences with the Z Fighters, and he is accosted by reporters; Babidi commands Majin Buu to kill Gohan and the Supreme Kai.

titulo: Majin osorubeshi!! Gohan ni semaru shi no kyôfu
descripcion: Gohan and the Supreme Kai fight Majin Buu; Mr. Satan attempts to fly; Dabura, realizing how dangerous Majin Buu is, tries to convince Babidi to reseal him before it's too late; Trunks and Goten reach the battle site.

titulo: Tabechauzo!! Harapeko Majin no chô nôryoku
descripcion: Dabura and Vegeta fight Majin Buu.

titulo: Senshi no ketsui!! Majin wa ore ga shimatsu suru
descripcion: Vegeta continues to fight Majin Buu.

titulo: Ai suru mono no tame ni... Bejîta chiru!!
descripcion: After being saved by the intervention of Trunks and Goten, Vegeta decides to put an end to Majin Buu, even if it costs him his life. Also, Piccolo fights with Babidi.

titulo: Akumu futatabi! Ikiteita Majin Bû
descripcion: In the aftermath of the battle with Majin Buu, the remaining Z Fighters and their friends look for survivors.

titulo: Bîderu-tachi no funtô! Sagase Doragon Bôru
descripcion: Having already found the first six dragon balls, Yamcha, Roshi, Android 18, Bulma, Chi-Chi, and Videl search for the last one. Piccolo and Krillin take Trunks and Goten to the Lookout to recover, and they talk with Dende about the current situation. Babidi and Majin Buu run amok and Goku wakes up.

titulo: Dekkai kibô!! Chibi-tachi no shin hissatsuwaza
descripcion: Goku, Piccolo, Krillin, Mr. Popo, and Dende discuss strategy for defeating Majin Buu, and Goku explains the Fusion Technique, which he learned in Other World; Majin Buu causes trouble at an amusement park; Bulma uses the dragon balls to call upon Shenron, the eternal dragon.

titulo: Goten Torankusu zensekai ni shimei tehai
descripcion: Kibito looks for Gohan and the Supreme Kai; Majin Buu causes trouble at a bakery; Goku tells those who do not know of Gohan and Vegeta's fates; Babidi telepathically communicates his plans and desires to everyone on Earth.

titulo: Gohan fukkatsu Kaiôshin no himitsu heiki!?
descripcion: Babidi and Majin Buu continue their reign of terror as they fish for the whereabouts of Trunks, Goten, and Piccolo. Trunks and Goten explore the Lookout. Gohan arrives on the Planet of the Kais with Kibito and the Supreme Kai, and he is told of the Z Sword.

titulo: Nuketaa~!! Densetsu no zetto sôdo
descripcion: Videl refuses to believe that Gohan is dead; Gohan removes the Z Sword and tries to wield it; Goku begins preparing Trunks and Goten for the Fusion Technique; Majin Buu destroys another city; Mr. Satan tries a new method of learning to fly, and his fans beg him to defeat Majin Buu.

titulo: Nerewareta nishi no miyako! Tomare Majin Bû!!
descripcion: Trunks and Goten practice raising their power to the same level for the Fusion Technique; Mr. Satan reassures the crowd; Babidi discovers that Trunks lives at Capsule Corporation, so Goku heads off Babidi and Majin Buu while Trunks races home.

titulo: Atto odoroku dai henshin!! Sûpâ Saiya-jin 3
descripcion: After explaining the different levels of a Saiyan to Babidi and Majin Buu, Goku transforms into Super Saiyan 3 and fights Majin Buu; at Capsule Corporation, Trunks looks for the dragon radar.

titulo: Bai Bai, Babidi!! Majin Bû hangyaku
descripcion: Goku continues his battle with Majin Buu as Trunks continues searching Capsule Corporation for the dragon radar. Back on the Planet of the Kais, Gohan continues to train with the Z Sword.

titulo: Mecha kakko warui!? Tokkun henshin pôzu
descripcion: Free from Babidi's control, Majin Buu causes even more destruction. Meanwhile, Gohan continues training with the Z Sword, and Goku teaches Trunks and Goten the Fusion Dance.

titulo: Jâ na min'na!! Gokû ano-yo ni kaeru
descripcion: Trunks and Goten continue to practice the Fusion Dance. Meanwhile, Majin Buu, after terrorizing a farm, builds a house and spends the day there.

titulo: Gohan wa dokoda!? Kaiôshin-kai no môtokkun
descripcion: Back in Other World, Goku finds Gohan on the Planet of the Kais and tells him what's been happening on Earth; Piccolo takes over the duty of training Trunks and Goten for the Fusion; Majin Buu befriends a blind boy.

titulo: Uso daro!? Zetto sôdo ga orechatta
descripcion: After Gohan accidentally breaks the Z Sword while testing its strength, an old Kai who was trapped inside the sword is released, and he promises to awaken Gohan's sleeping powers. Meanwhile, Trunks and Goten continue practicing the Fusion Dance.

titulo: Gattai chôjin tanjô!! Sono na wa Gotenkusu
descripcion: After several mess ups, Trunks and Goten finally fuse correctly, and the new entity, Gotenks, goes after Majin Buu, who is busy destroying ships. Meanwhile, Old Kai continues the ceremony to unlock Gohan's sleeping powers.

titulo: Saishû heiki shidô!? Satan wa chikyû o sukû
descripcion: Having been defeated easily by Majin Buu in their first battle, Trunks and Goten practice the Fusion Technique with renewed vigor; Mr. Satan emerges from his training facility and goes to Majin Buu's house; Old Kai finishes his ceremony to awaken Gohan's sleeping powers.

titulo: Korosu no yameta!! Majin Bû yoi ko sengen
descripcion: Gohan and Old Kai meditate; Trunks and Goten fuse while they are both Super Saiyans; two thugs run amok, killing everyone they see; Majin Buu befriends a puppy.

titulo: Nigero Satan!! Ikari no Majin Bû shutsugen
descripcion: Start of the "Fusion Saga". In a rage, Mr. Satan fights the two thugs. Majin Buu heals the puppy, rebuilds his house, and relaxes with Mr. Satan. Gohan grows impatient with waiting, and he tells Old Kai about Bulma. One of the thugs comes back to cause trouble for Majin Buu and Piccolo scolds Trunks and Goten for being gone for too long.

titulo: Dotchi ga katsu no!? Zen'aku Bû-Bû taiketsu
descripcion: Majin Buu fights Bad Buu; Trunks and Goten rest.

titulo: Matta nashi no hakyoku!! Chikyû jinrui zetsumetsu
descripcion: As Majin Buu waits on Gotenks, he goes about killing the rest of Earth's population; Krillin tries to sneak Trunks and Goten into the time chamber; Gohan grows increasingly impatient with waiting.

titulo: Tokkun seikô!! Kore de owari da Majin Bû
descripcion: Trunks and Goten train in the time chamber as Majin Buu waits and Piccolo stalls.

titulo: Honki de ikuze!! Sûpâ Gotenkusu zenkai
descripcion: Gotenks starts fast as he fights Majin Buu, using a variety of new techniques.

titulo: Yatta ze!! Obake de seikô Bû taiji!?
descripcion: Gotenks uses the Super Ghost Kamikaze Attack against Majin Buu; Goku can't sense Gotenks' or Majin Buu's energy, and he realizes that they're fighting in the time chamber; Mr. Satan and Bee wander the desert and think about their time with Majin Buu.

titulo: Ijigen kara no dasshutsu!! Sûpâ Gotenkusu 3
descripcion: Majin Buu escapes the time chamber. As Piccolo and Gotenks try to find a way out, Majin Buu terrorizes the Lookout, and Goku, Kibito, and the Supreme Kai look on helplessly through their crystal ball.

titulo: Norisugi!? Bû Bû Barêbôru
descripcion: Super Saiyan 3 Gotenks fights Majin Buu. Also, Mr. Satan and Bee find a city.

titulo: Masani gurêto!! Shinsei Gohan chikyû e
descripcion: As his fusion runs out, Gotenks continues fighting against Majin Buu. Also, Gohan finishes his training.

titulo: Bû o attô!! Gohan no mirakuru pawâ
descripcion: Goten and Trunks try to sneak up on Majin Buu, who has fallen asleep. Also, Gohan returns to Earth and fights Majin Buu.

titulo: Yatta ka!? Majin Bû dai bakuhatsu
descripcion: As Majin Buu continues to fight Gohan, he realizes that he can't win, so he self-destructs, hoping to take Gohan with him. Afterward, Gohan, Piccolo, Goten, and Trunks search for Dende, and they find Mr. Satan and Bee wandering in the desert.

titulo: Bû saiaku no hansoku!! Gotenkusu kyûshû!?
descripcion: Majin Buu absorbs Gotenks and Piccolo, and he continues to fight Gohan.

titulo: Zen uchû no tame ni... Yomigaere Son Gokû
descripcion: Majin Buu pummels Gohan as Goku and Vegeta prepare to return to Earth.

titulo: Kiseki wa ishido... Naru ka Gohan to no chô gattai
descripcion: Old Kai explains to Goku how the earring fusion works. Also, Tien and Goku show up to help Gohan, who is still getting pounded by Majin Buu.

titulo: Gattai!! Bejîta no hokori to Gokû no ikari
descripcion: Vegeta returns to Earth, and he and Goku fight Majin Buu. Also, Goku tries to convince Vegeta to fuse with him.

titulo: Sôzetsu pawâ!! Kyûkoku o koeru Bejitto
descripcion: Vegito, the fusion between Goku and Vegeta, fights Majin Buu; Dende and Mr. Satan look for the battle; in Other World, Videl, Chi-Chi, Bulma, and Dabura look for Gohan.

titulo: Jigen ni keretsu!! Bû ga kirechatta!?
descripcion: Super Saiyan Vegito fights Majin Buu; Krillin gets the tour of the Grand Kai's planet as Yamcha trains.

titulo: Bû no oku no te!! Amedama ni natchae
descripcion: Vegito continues fighting Majin Buu, who is getting frustrated and is using the special attacks of the people he has absorbed. In Other World, Videl tries to convince everyone that Gohan is still alive.

titulo: Hîrô sôshitsu!? Kyûshû sareta Bejitto
descripcion: Vegito is turned into candy by Majin Buu, but he continues to fight; King Kai considers sending Krillin and Yamcha back to Earth to help in the battle; King Yemma tells Fortune Teller Baba the story of how he convinced Vegeta to help.

titulo: Ma no meikyû!! Bû no onaka ni nani ga aru!?
descripcion: Goku and Vegeta, separated inside Majin Buu's body, try to find a way out. Meanwhile, Majin Buu, thrilled with himself for having absorbed Vegito, goes on a destructive rampage.

titulo: Akumu ka maboroshi ka!? Gokû to Gohan no oyako taiketsu
descripcion: Goku and Vegeta befriend a family of worms living inside Majin Buu. They continue searching for Trunks, Goten, Gohan, and Piccolo, but instead they find versions of them that Majin Buu has created in his mind, and they must fight them. Meanwhile, Majin Buu eats everything he can find.

titulo: Majin no himitsu!! Bû no naka ni 2-ri no Bû
descripcion: Goku and Vegeta try to rescue their friends from Majin Buu's mind, and they find the good Buu trapped their as well. Also, Majin Buu enters his own mind and fights Goku and Vegeta.

titulo: Deguchi wa doko da!? Kusureru Bû kara dasshutsu
descripcion: Start of the "Kid Buu Saga". Goku and Vegeta disconnect the good Buu from Majin Buu's mind, retrieve the pods containing their friends, and attempt to escape as Majin Buu's body begins to change.

titulo: Chikyû shômetsu!! Bû jâku e no gyaku henshin
descripcion: Kibito Kai tells the story of how Bibidi created Majin Buu, and his battle with the Kais. Also, Majin Buu attempts to destroy Earth.

titulo: Bû raishû!! Kaiôshin-kai de ketchaku da
descripcion: Mr. Satan tries to convince himself that everything that has happened is just a dream; Majin Buu destroys lots of planets while looking for Goku and Vegeta, who are trying to form a plan revolving around the use of the dragon balls.

titulo: Mirai o tsukame!! Uchû o kaketa daikessen
descripcion: Goku fights Majin Buu.

titulo: Bejîta datsubô!! Gokû omae ga No. 1 da
descripcion: Goku, now at Super Saiyan 3, and Vegeta take turns fighting Majin Buu, and Vegeta admires Goku's abilities.

titulo: Taenuke Bejîta!! Inochigake no 1-punkan
descripcion: Super Saiyan 3 Goku continues to fight Majin Buu, who taunts him. Also, Vegeta holds Majin Buu off so that Goku can power up.

titulo: Satan o ijimeru na!! Ganzo Bû fukkatsu
descripcion: Vegeta continues holding off Majin Buu as Goku powers up, and Mr. Satan lends a hand. Also, Kibito Kai and Dende consider helping.

titulo: Bejîta no hisaku!! Porunga to 2-tsu no negai
descripcion: Vegeta tells Dende, Kibito Kai, and Old Kai to go to New Namek so that they can use their dragon balls to restore Earth and its population. Meanwhile, good Majin Buu fights evil Majin Buu.

titulo: Saigo no kibô!! Tsukuru ze dekkai Genki-Dama
descripcion: Vegeta calls upon Earth's population to give up their energy to Goku, who begins charging his Spirit Bomb. Meanwhile, good Majin Buu continues to fight evil Majin Buu. Also, the people of Earth celebrate their new lives.

titulo: Chô kangeki!! Dekita ze min'na no Genki-Dama
descripcion: Good Majin Buu and Vegeta hold off evil Majin Buu as Goku and Mr. Satan beg the people of Earth for their help.

titulo: Yappari saikyô Son Gokû!! Majin Bû shômetsu
descripcion: After good Majin Buu and Mr. Satan save Vegeta, Goku releases his Spirit Bomb in a final attempt to destroy evil Majin Buu.

titulo: Modotta heiwa!! Seigi no mikata Majin Bû!?
descripcion: The Z Fighters and the people of Earth celebrate after the defeat of Majin Buu. Also, Dende heals good Majin Buu, who attempts to adjust to his new life on Earth.

titulo: Ozoi ze Gokû! Min'na de pâti!!
descripcion: The Z Fighters gather for a party at Bulma's house while Goku protects a bird's egg.

titulo: Gokû ojî-chan! Watashi ga Pan yo!!
descripcion: It is ten years after the defeat of Majin Buu. Trunks shows up at Goku's house, where he talks to Chi-Chi, Gohan, and Videl. He then goes out to the country to meet Goku and Goten, who are training. Vegeta and Bulma also arrive, and Goku tells everyone of his plans to enter the World Martial Arts Tournament because he thinks there will be a serious challenger this year. Also, Pan, the daughter of Gohan and Videl, arrives and announces her plan to enter the tournament as well. Later, everyone arrives at the tournament and gets settled.

titulo: Oura wa Ûbu! Ima 10-sai de moto Majin!?
descripcion: The competitors who have made it past the preliminary round of the World Martial Arts Tournament draw numbers to determine who will fight whom in the next round, and the fights begin as Pan faces Wild Tiger and Goku faces Uub.

titulo: Motto tsuyoku!! Gokû no yume wa chô dekkê
descripcion: Goku continues to fight Uub, the reincarnation of Majin Buu, at the World Martial Arts Tournament.
